ArgonTest.Name: Type test (Generic class)
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
open class A <: Object
public new() end
end class B(T: type) <: A
field value: T
public new(value: T) field value = value initialize _ = A.new() end
public def _.value: T = value
end class C <: A
public new() initialize _ = A.new() end
end
proc main(): Unit do val a: A = B(String).new 'Checked type parameter' match a case val b: B Int = puts 'Did not check type parameter' case val b: B String = puts b.value end end
